title: AI Agent Systems and Design Patterns with Langgraph
description: I gave a presentation on AI agent design, explaining popular design patterns and conducting a live demo using LangGraph.

title: MLOps and Large Language Models
event: AI STORM - Bandırma Onyedi Eylül University
description: I gave a presentation titled “MLOps and Large Language Models” at the AISTORM event held at Bandırma Onyedi Eylül University on May 5th.

title: End-to-End YOLO11 Deployment: From Deep Learning Theory to Scalable GPU Inference
description: In the presentation, we covered deep learning concepts and YOLO architecture details, trained the official Ultralytics YOLO11 model with PyTorch, optimized it to a TensorRT engine, and deployed it as a scalable GPU-powered Docker service.
